name: Web Dynpro - Never use direct calls to routine via "me->", use "wd_This->" instead
description: This rule checks Web Dynpro source code for direct calls to routine using the "me-->" instance.
output:
Associated to each ABAP Web Dynpro Method/Event Handler/Supply Function with violations, the Quality Rule provides:
- The number of violation patterns
rationale:
Special rules apply for the implementation of Web Dynpro routines, such as "wd_Do_Init" methods. Some ABAP language statements cannot be used.
Other routines cannot be called directly - instead they must be called with the "wd_This" instance. The reason for this is that a direct call makes any extensions made from restructured layers impossible.
remediation: Replace the "me->" calls with a delegation using "wd_This->".
total: Number of Web Dynpro Methods, Web Dynpro Event Handlers and Web Dynpro Supply Functions
